text: Tomka and his friends () is a 1977 Albanian drama film directed by Xhanfise Keko. The film stars Enea Zheku as Tomka, the leader of a group of boys fighting Nazis. The movie was mostly shot in the city of Berat, Albania. == Plot == Tomka is a boy who likes playing football with his friends. When the German army captures his town, the German soldiers establish their camp in the town stadium. Tomka with help from his friends and their parents organizes sabotage actions against the soldiers. == External links == *Tomka dhe shokët e tij at IMDb Category:1977 films Category:Albanian films Category:Albanian- language films Category:Films directed by Xhanfise Keko Category:World War II films Category:1977 drama films Category:Albanian drama films
title: Tomka and His Friends
